channel.title: Coding questions...come all :)
channel.description:
Welp, here they are I'll cross 'em off if they're answered....And I understand it and have fixed/done it.
1) How do you get rid of ALL the teleportation spells (including the ones I have on the ancients tab)
2) How do I make requirements for magic spells (including ancients) and the requirement of runes to use them
3) Could someone please give me the complete code for mining?
5) how do you make walls?
6) On the emote page, how do you change the emote name? One of 'em says Bank, I changed what it DOES, but now I need to change the "name" of it.
7) How do you enable selling your stuff (anything) to a shop?

item.title: Coding questions...come all :)
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

5) how do you make walls?

Use Fedexer’s GlobalObjects and then add it… Look on: rune-server.org

Read full topic

item.title: Coding questions...come all :)
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

[shut up] Hmm, didn’t know that asking for help was taking credit for anything? What, because I want someone to help me set up mining, that makes me a “code stealer?” Wtf? Well, thanks tons for YOUR help. [Oh, and yes, not putting an end tag here because you can continue to shut up…stupid flamers ;(]

Read full topic
